pkgmetadata.longdescription: Inference on Many Jumps in Nonparametric Panel Regression Models // Provides uniform testing procedures for existence and heterogeneity of threshold effects in high-dimensional nonparametric panel regression models. The package accompanies the paper Chen, Keilbar, Su and Wang (2023) "Inference on many jumps in nonparametric panel regression models". arXiv preprint doi:10.48550/arXiv.2312.01162.
